name: CDSHooksServices
title: CDSHooks Services Request (Logical Definition)
description: This structure is defined to allow the FHIR Validator to validate a CDSHooks Services response body

element.short: The response to the discovery endpoint
element.definition: The response to the discovery endpoint

element.comment: If the CDS server hosts no CDS services, the discovery endpoint should return a 200 HTTP response with an empty array of services

element.short: The hook this Services should be invoked on
element.definition: The hook this Services should be invoked on

element.short: The human-friendly name of this Services (Recommended)
element.definition: The human-friendly name of this Services (Recommended)

element.short: The URL to this service which is available at: {baseUrl}/cds-services/{id}
element.definition: The {id} portion of the URL to this service which is available at ```{baseUrl}/cds-services/{id}```

element.short: Human-friendly description of any preconditions for the use of this CDS Services
element.definition: Human-friendly description of any preconditions for the use of this CDS Services

element.short: Key/value pairs of FHIR queries the CDS Client provides on each call
element.definition: An object containing key/value pairs of FHIR queries that this Services is requesting the CDS Client to perform and provide on each Services call. The key is a string that describes the type of data being requested and the value is a string representing the FHIR query

element.short: Key of FHIR query - name for client to use when sending to Services
element.definition: Key of FHIR query - name for client to use when sending to Services

element.short: Value of FHIR query - FHIR Query for client to perform
element.definition: Value of FHIR query - FHIR Query for client to perform
